data.title: Send money to Algeria
data.meta_description: Sending money to Algeria with Western Union is simple and reliable. Find out how to support your loved ones from afar.
data.text:
To send money to Algeria online, youâll need to provide us with the following information:

The full name of your receiver in Algeria; make sure that it matches the name on the ID that the receiver will use to collect the funds.

The email address and telephone number of the receiver, if you have them.

The reason for transferring money to Algeria.

Information about the source of the funds.

You will also need to register and verify your Western Union profile.

To send money to Algeria from an agent location in France, follow these steps:

Locate your nearest agent location using our online tool.

Provide the agent with all the required information about your receiver, and present a valid in-date ID document, as well as a Western Union number or cell phone number.

Remember to have a document with you to prove the source of the funds, such as a paycheck, bank statement or tax return. One of these items may be requested.

Make the payment for your money transfer to Algeria in cash or by card.

You will find your MTCN (money transfer control number) on your receipt. Be sure to share it with the receiver.

Please note that it is also possible to start the process online and pay in person at an agent location within 24 hours.

Compare the transfer fees3 corresponding to each payment method, and check EUR/DZD exchange rates using our fees estimation tool. You will also be able to see estimated transfer times. For example, transfers from France paid in cash can be withdrawn in Algeria in just a few minutes1.

Please bear in mind that the payment method chosen may affect the delivery time for the funds. For example, a money transfer to Algeria paid in cash can arrive in a few minutes1, but this can take three business days when paid for by bank transfer.
